message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $8,500 is too low. Could you do $9,000? I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price considering the value you'll gain.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,800? That's the best I can do for now.
